description.en: Explore a corporate Windows server, identify poor security practices, and perform brute force attacks to access a privileged user and escalate to administrator.

instructions.us: Paste the flag you found with format FLAG{hash}
instructions.es: Agrega el la bandera que encontraste con el formato FLAG{hash}
